name: Don't Bite Me Bro! +
description: Don't Bite Me Bro! is a 1-4 Player Couch Co-op open-world zombie apocalypse game. Explore the world for resources, find and save survivors throughout the world, each which become playable characters with unique traits and abilities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 4.0 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 512 MB available space
